channel.title: Abouts on Ming zefei's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Ming zefei's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am Guangbin Hua (华广斌), graduated from the School of Materials Science and Engineering at Beihang University in 2022, where I received a Bachelor of Engineering degree under the guidance of Prof. Qianfan Zhang (张千帆), with a minor in Mathematics and Applied Mathematics. In 2025, I graduated from the School of Reliability and Systems Engineering at Beihang University
